tool_description: Get random trivia. Search based on category or topic.
title: Trivia

api_list.name: /trivia/random
api_list.description: Get a random trivia for a given category(optional)

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: Category to get the trivia from

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trivia5.p.rapidapi.com/trivia/random"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trivia5.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: /trivia/search
api_list.description: Search for random trivia which has the text in the query, for a given category(optional).

optional_parameters.name: query
optional_parameters.description: Text to search for in the trivia

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: Category to get the trivia from

api_list.name: /trivia
api_list.description: Get a Trivia entry for a given id. Retrieves a trivia question and answer based on the id.

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description: ID of the trivia to fetch

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trivia5.p.rapidapi.com/trivia"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trivia5.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
